name: PUTIN, BOOBS and TRUMP
description:
PUTIN, BOOBS and TRUMP

Imagine what the world would be if Putin lost the elections of 2018?
You can not? That's right, because it's unreal, but nevertheless we asked this question and that's what we got

In the game you have to play for Vladimir Putin who is trying to regain power, he will be protested by the acting President Navalny, US President Donald Trump, German Chancellor Angela Merkel, as well as Ilon Mask, Kim Chen Eun and many others.

In the game you will have to manage Vladimir Putin, you can shoot at many famous and world personalities, shoot at missiles and zombie presidents, all the time you will be under heavy fire and that to survive you will need not only to kill enemies, but also avoid collision with them. Destroy enemies, take damage and regain the throne of the president.

Game features:
  • Your character is the most powerful person on the Earth
  • The ability to make world history
  • Cartoon style
  • 5000 ACHIEVEMENT
